actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to require the Federal Communications Commission to prescribe rules respecting interconnections with telephone company facilities of equipment not furnished by such companies.

summary.text: Requires, under the Communications Act of 1934, the Federal Communications Commission to prescribe rules respecting interconnections with telephone company facilities of equipment not furnished by such companies. Provides civil penalties for violations of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to require the Federal Communications Commission to prescribe rules respecting interconnections with telephone company facilities of equipment not furnished by such companies.
